verbose_text: In addition, insulin and other growth factor signaling activates Class I PI3K-Akt, which inhibits autophagy via activation of the mTOR signaling complex 1 and inhibition of the Beclin 1 class III PI3K complex, which contains Beclin 1, class III phosphatidylinositol-3-kinase (PIK3C3), and ATG14L.
evidence: activates Class I PI3K-Akt, which inhibits autophagy via activation of the mTOR signaling complex 1 and inhibition of the Beclin 1 class III PI3K
